The video shows a man prostrated on the: suggesting that he has been arrested.
Multiple Facebook pages: including News Rajasthan and Oriental Times India, have shared the video with captions claiming that a terrorist was arrested at either Jaipur or Delhi airport.
The video was viewed more than 96: 000 times and shared more than 2,500 times on Facebook.
The authenticity of the claim was verifi: which led to a fact-check article published by The Quint confirming that a 27-year-old former bodyguard was arrested at Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport. Additionally, a report by Deccan Chronicle provided details of the incident, stating that the person arrested attempted to snatch a pistol from a jawan and hit at least two CISF men.
